mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT news_no, keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt AS pubDt, reg_dt AS regDt FROM news WHERE TRUNC(reg_dt)=TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY pub_dt DESC ) t WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * #{pageNo} ) WHERE rnum > #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEWS ( keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt, reg_dt ) SELECT DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 3), 1, '화재', 2, '재난', 0, '홍수') AS keyword, '주제' || (LEVEL + 1) AS title, '신문사' || MOD(LEVEL, 3) AS company, 'naver.com' || (LEVEL + 1) AS url, SYSDATE + (LEVEL - 1) AS pub_dt, SYSDATE AS reg_dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 100
mapper.select:
SELECT news_no, keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt AS pubDt, reg_dt AS regDt
FROM news WHERE (TRUNC(reg_dt) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AND keyword=#{keyword} ORDER BY pub_dt DESC
SELECT news_no, keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt AS pubDt, reg_dt AS regDt FROM news WHERE url = #{url}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO NEWS t1 USING ( SELECT #{url} AS url FROM dual ) t2 ON (t1.url = t2.url AND t2.url IS NOT NULL) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t1.keyword = #{keyword}, t1.title = #{title}, t1.company = #{company}, t1.pub_dt = #{pubDt}, t1.reg_dt = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt, reg_dt) VALUES (#{keyword}, #{title}, #{company}, #{url}, #{pubDt}, SYSDATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( keyword, title, company, url, pub_dt, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{keyword}, #{title}, #{company}, #{url}, #{pubDt}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NEWS WHERE news_no = #{newsNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
